title: Phanatical phor PhillyMore reasons to visit the brotherly city
content:
Phanatical phor Philly  
More reasons to visit the brotherly city  
BY | REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN  

 

Until later this week, after Pope Francis pays a call there for the World Meeting of Families, all eyes will be on Philadelphia. 
The City of Brotherly Love has treated the occasion with plans as elaborate as an Olympiad or a presidential inauguration. And, of course, pope merchandise has been in the gift shops and sidewalk vendors' stands since July.
